title: Inside OpenAIâ€™s Raid on Thinking Machines Lab
contentSnippet: OpenAI is planning to bring over more researchers from Thinking Machines Lab after nabbing two cofounders, a source familiar with the situation says. Plus, the latest efforts to automate jobs with AI.
